name: Lost Soul
description:
In Lost Soul, you’re a soul that got lost in an unknown place after a plane crash, and now you need to challenge yourself to find your brother!

You and your brother were planning to take a trip together to go on vacation, but you didn't imagine that the worst could happen…

Explode the gates using high intensity lasers to open paths and fight enemies, but don't forget to enjoy nature around you :)

You must face this adventure to save your brother from the evil souls that were on the plane before the crash!

Do you accept the challenge?

PUSH BOXES TO ACTIVATE TOTEMS!
Some gates are broken with lasers.

FACE THE ENEMIES!
Don't feel sorry for them, they won't have you.

FIGHT WITH BRAVERY!


Roll to dodge the shots and counter them by attacking at the right moment.

BEWARE OF SOULS!


Those are your enemies.

EXPLORE THE PLACE!
Discover new areas.

CHARACTERISTICS:

 -Cartoon graphics
-Fluid combat
-Contains history
-Puzzles
-Top-down Camera
